author: timbeiko
content:
Friendly reminder that there's a 1559 implementers' call at 14:00 UTC tomorrow (Thursday, April 30) 

Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/167
Zoom: To be posted here shortly before the call. 

Dan Finlay will also be going over his counter proposal for 1559 (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2593)

author: sambacha
content: saw Besu has the mining integration done

author: abdel.stark
content: <@!273808422753796097> The MAX_GAS_EIP1559 is 20M ? The specification currently set it to 16M. Just to make sure we are on the same page. Both Besu and Geth implementations are using the 16M value for the moment.

author: timbeiko
content: I assume this is because the proposal was first done with 8M blocks on mainnet, but agreed it'd be a good thing to clarify.

author: .vbuterin
content: Right, I understood the 16M as being twice the target which was 8M back then and it should be updated
